note.p: Education: Exeter College, Oxford; BA (1659); Jesus College, Oxford; MA (1661), LLD?
Career: ? Assistant to the Royal African Company (1702)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Foster; Davies
References: Michael Hunter, 'The Social Bias and Changing Fortunes of an Early Scientific Institution: An Analysis of the Membership of the Royal Society, 1660-1685' in NR 1976-7 vol 31 pp 9-114
